vclaim: USA Today wrapped a weekend print edition in a full-page ad resembling that paper's actual front page that included fake news stories about hybrid babies.
title: Did USA Today Run a ‘Front Page’ Ad With Fake Stories About Hybrid Babies?
subtitle: The advertisement — a faux front page of USA Today's weekend print edition wrapped around the real front page — was for the Netflix show "Sweet Tooth."
author: Alex Kasprak
